mapper.select: SELECT b.projNo,b.name,b.target,c.actual FROM ( SELECT cpbh AS projNo, name, sum(je) AS target FROM (SELECT cpbh,mbcbbh,je,(CASE WHEN mbcbbh LIKE 'C%' OR mbcbbh LIKE 'S%' THEN '器材费' WHEN mbcbbh LIKE 'Z20%' THEN '加工费' WHEN mbcbbh LIKE 'Z30%' THEN '专项费' ELSE '' END) AS name FROM [192.168.0.99\cb].[cbxt].[dbo].[mbcb] WHERE cpbh = #{projNo} AND mbcbbh IN (SELECT mbcbbh FROM [192.168.0.99\cb].[cbxt].[dbo].[mbcbdm] WHERE isnull(mjbz,'0') = '1')) a WHERE a.name='器材费' OR a.name='加工费' OR a.name='专项费' GROUP BY a.cpbh,a.name) b LEFT JOIN (SELECT gcbh AS projNo,(CASE WHEN yyyymm='用友专项费' THEN '专项费' WHEN yyyymm='物资领料' THEN '器材费' ELSE '加工费' END) AS name,SUM(je) AS actual FROM [192.168.0.99\cb].[cbxt].[dbo].[uv_getcb_ini] WHERE gcbh IN (SELECT gcbh FROM [192.168.0.99\cb].[cbxt].[dbo].[uv_outercode_gcdm] WHERE cpbh = #{projNo}) GROUP BY gcbh,(CASE WHEN yyyymm='用友专项费' THEN '专项费' WHEN yyyymm='物资领料' THEN '器材费' ELSE '加工费' END)) c ON b.projNo=c.projNo AND b.name=c.name
